name: Ines Table´s Unstable Potion Factory
description:
How to Play:

• Each potion has a label with a color

•Grab the potion by clicking on it and click on the colors above the Select marker (on the right side of the screen) to make the liquid match the label

• Do it quickly! if the timer for the potion runs out it will explode

• 3 exploding potions and you're out of the lab :(

Controls:

Left-Click - Grab the potions / change the color

Ian Le Bot and Agustina Marega are students at Image Campus https://www.imagecampus.edu.ar/ #ImageCampus
